productionDesc1.message: Automatic & simultaneous synchronization of course and learning data across desktops and mobile devices

productionDesc2.message: Content creation and management, registration and administration, teaching/learning delivery, communications, testing, tracking and reporting

productionDesc4.message: Use of AI technology applications such as AI face recognition, plagiarism detection, etc.

productionDesc5.message: Provide different levels of data analytics service

capabilityName1.message: Intelligent Textbook Presented in Multiple Formats

capabilityDesc1.message: An intelligent textbook is developed by aggregating and integrating rich media content including video, audio, animation, text, pictures, games, and AR/VR content. It’s then published and presented through mobile devices, desktops, and paper books. By using QR code, OCR etc., rich content is integrated and presented through multiple formats as an “Intelligent Textbook.”

capabilityDesc2.message: Enable you to provide interactive content in the format of intelligent textbook to your users.

capabilityDesc3.message: Adaptive learning engine recommends personalized learning content and path to students, provides personalized teaching recommendation to teachers, helps teaching  institutes to upgrade to intelligent teaching.

institute1.message: Enable institute in digital transformation of education

institute2.message: Help institute to enhance teaching quality

institute4.message: Able to acquire teaching & learning data

teacher2.message: Be able to know the learning status of your students in real-time and adjust teaching progress accordingly.

teacher3.message: Automatic marking and generating grade reports thus reducing teacher’s workload

teacher4.message: Acquire student learning data and support quantitative teaching research

student3.message: Richer experience than a traditional setting

proven.message: Used & proven by millions of users, proven secure and reliable
